by.kovalenko.periodicals.connectionpool
Class ConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
  by.kovalenko.periodicals.connectionpool.ConnectionPool

public class ConnectionPool
extends Object

Class ConnectionPool is used for storing, providing and releasing database connections. It contains methods for connection pool initialization and releasing the pool. Class ConnectionPool implements Singleton pattern and based on collections and semaphore. Log4j is used for logging error messages.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kovalenko Darya, BSU, 2012
